QuestData.Title: Call of Duty
QuestData.Description: Listen up, $r!$b$bA new landmass has emerged off the coast of Eastern Kingdoms and we are engaged in a critical battle for control of the island!$b$bVictory there will leave Stormwind completely defenseless!$b$bNow is the time to strike!$b$bReport to the docks at once for transport to the battle.$b$bEvery warship is engaged, so you'll be boarding a mercenary vessel commissioned by the Warchief himself.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Ride the mercenary ship to Vashj'ir
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the mercenary ship to battle.
QuestData.RewardText: Not exactly the battle you had anticipated, I'll wager. But a battle nonetheless, as you shall soon see....

Objectives.Objective: Ride the mercenary ship to Vashj'ir
